ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron growled softly, something was wrong. Her ears swiveled back and forth as she tried desperately to pinpoint the location of the disturbance. Her optics

Tavatron growled softly, something was wrong. Her ears swiveled back 
and forth as she tried desperately to pinpoint the location of the 
disturbance. Her optics fizzled on and off. Her internal repairs had 
restored her vision to the point where she could see partial images, 
but her sight was still lacking when compared to that of a normal 
'bot. Tavatron's growl deepened, something was definitely amiss. She 
positioned her head in order to get a better veiw of Dark One, only
to see him cringe in pain then fall to the floor moments later. (I 
don't mean to mode, if Yanshosh says different just change that one 
line to whatever he says.)

Tavatron was about to say something when suddenly her bonds were 
released. 'What's going on here?' Tavatron wondered momentarily. A 
resue operation? It was a possibility, but one couldn't rule out the 
chance of a Predacon attack. In one fluid motion Tavatron rolled back 
then forward, jumping to her feet. She wavered for a moment, but 
quickly regained her balance. She drew her sword and growled softly, 
still unsure of the situation, but positive that someone other than 
the two Alliance 'bots were present in the room:

"Who's there?! Show yourself!"

Tavatron's gaze drifted to Iron Raptor, who also appeared to be free. 
A fortunate turn of events that helped settle her rising nerves. It 
wasn't like her to be so unsure of her surroundings, but given her 
current conditoin it was something she had expected. First, however, 
she wanted to know who her rescuer was:

"I will ask this only once more, who are you?"
